title: Drawing, "Sketches from the Niagara Falls, Terrapin Rocks and the Horseshoe with the Canadian bank.", March 20, 1856
inscribed: Verso: Inscribed according to Rudolph Berliner, 1943: "blue shadow";; "scattereed trees ... (?0"; "evergreens"; "snow"; "Dark green"; "orange bronw"; "black"; "Bushes".  Caption, date, bottom center.
description: Horizontal view with Terrapin Point shown in left foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches from the Niagara Falls, Terrapin Rocks and the Horseshoe with the Canadian bank.", March 20, 1856.
March 20, 1856. Graphite on light blue paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-316-b.
